issue.title: [Python] "pytest pyarrow" takes over 10 seconds to collect tests and start executing
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9450](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9450). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is caused by the `_find_new_unicode_codepoints` function in test_compute.py.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9450?focusedCommentId=17157247) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
This is a major annoyance for development.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9450?focusedCommentId=17157352) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7749
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7749>
